title: Mexican Corn Salad
instructions: Add the sweetcorn, tomatoes, red onion, jalapeños, feta, and coriander to a large bowl and mix well.
In a separate bowl, melt the butter and stir in the mayonnaise, paprika, and lemon juice.
Pour the dressing over the salad and stir to combine.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for later.
notes: Can be made up to 24 hours in advance.
Store leftovers in the fridge for 3–5 days.
Use vegan feta and dairy-free margarine for a vegan version.
